title: Marvel's Iron Man VR Gets Delayed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.17.20
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

If you go to http://getquip.com/games right now, you’ll get your first refill free!

Get started with your first month of Hims free by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

Another one bites the dust. Blessing and Tim sit down and discuss this week's latest delay, Iron Man VR.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:47 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:04:37 - Iron Man VR Gets Delayed
00:06:01 - “I have a theory about all the recent delays…” - Katie
00:22:23 - ‘Call Of Duty’ Totally Dominated The 20 Best-Selling Video Games Of The Decade
00:30:08 - “Do you think console exclusivity hurts single player games from selling copies in terms of making these top selling lists?” - Frank Furtter
00:33:53 - CD Projekt reveals that development staff have been required to crunch on upcoming RPG
00:38:55 - Cyberpunk 2077 Multiplayer Likely Not Playable Until After 2021
00:43:11 - Out today
00:45:00 - Upstart
00:46:31 - Hims
00:48:38 - QUIP  
 Reader mail   -
00:53:45 - “What you think each other’s GOTY will be?” - Marcus Hutchens
00:59:58 - “Is Playstation still poised to win the next generation?” - Midnight Owl
01:04:41 - Squad Up: Josh - Steam - JHugs
01:06:04 - You‘re Wrong
01:06:57 - Post Show
